explains: adj. 声调高的；声音尖锐的；紧张的；陡的

sentences.en: A woman squealed in a high-pitched voice.
sentences.cn: 一位女士尖声叫了起来。

sentences.en: The big man had a high-pitched reedy voice.
sentences.cn: 这个胖男人有个尖而难听的声音。

sentences.en: In this study, the researchers looked at the high-pitched barks a prairie dog makes when it spots predator.
sentences.cn: 在这项研究中，研究人员观察了土拨鼠发现捕食者时发出的高音吠叫声。
